long_description: Perfect for smallr goggles, the Gheeks Goggle Cover Jr. for boys protects and cleans snow goggles. Neoprene cover offers durable, water-resistant protection. Includes a microfiber cleaning cloth designed to clean the inside of lens. To use the Gheeks Goggle Cover Jr., simply open clip and fasten over goggles strap, pull cover over the face of the goggles and attach the remaining clip to the other side.
short_description: Perfect for smallr goggles, the Gheeks Goggle Cover Jr. for boys protects and cleans snow goggles.
